className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

hideWhenUncentered.description: If true, the arrow will be hidden when it can't point to the center of the anchor element.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.

staticOffset.description: Forces a static offset over dynamic positioning under a certain condition.

tipRadius.description: The corner radius (rounding) of the arrow tip.
